RainbruRPG::Options::LanguageListItem

RainbruRPG::Options::LanguageListItem Class Reference

#include <languagelistitem.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A class defining a language.

It represents a Language/Country pair. The language configuration file is config/languages.xml

Definition at line 39 of file languagelistitem.h.

const char * RainbruRPG::Options::LanguageListItem::getLanguageCountry (  ) 

Get the LanguageCountry string.

If LL is the language and CC is the country, the value returned will be LL_CC.

Returns:
The LanguageCountry string

Member Data Documentation

const char* RainbruRPG::Options::LanguageListItem::languageCode [private]

The code of the language.

It is a 2 character code in lower case.

Definition at line 75 of file languagelistitem.h.

const char* RainbruRPG::Options::LanguageListItem::countryCode [private]

The code of the country.

It is a 2 character code in upper case.

Definition at line 81 of file languagelistitem.h.

float RainbruRPG::Options::LanguageListItem::completePerCent [private]

The complete percent of this translation.

if it is 100.00f, the translation for this language is up to date.
